channel.title: Comments for page "Fruit Stand"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Fruit Stand"

item.title: Extra RP?
item.content:encoded:
I have just registered for the BillyCon for the first time since I got the fruit stand and I got this message "+5 Fresh Fruit RP!"
Do you guys reckon that this is a hidden reward from Fruit Stand?

Edit: Nevermind, realised that occurred due to the Fresh Fruit. Not the Fruit Stand.
